attributes.action: Pass a law saying that no company or corporation can control more than one region of ITV.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned believe that the merger between Carlton Communications PLC and Granada, which has lead to ITV PLC taking over all the ITV regions, has lead to the decline of quality in ITV programming.

If you pass this measure, which would certainly help with free competition, television in Britain would almost certainly improve.
